snippet: Iranian naval forces freed a Chinese freighter hijacked by Somali pirates off southern Iran on Friday and arrested all the attackers, the semiofficial Iranian news agency Fars reported.
abstract: Iran's naval forces free a Chinese freighter hijacked by Somali pirates off southern Iran and arrest all the attackers.
lead_paragraph: Iranian naval forces freed a Chinese freighter hijacked by Somali pirates off southern Iran on Friday and arrested all the attackers, the semiofficial Iranian news agency Fars reported.
